channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Insurers Drop Obesity Drug Coverage, Access Worsens For Those Most In Need
item.description: At least 12% of adults in the U.S. have been prescribed a glucagon‐like peptide‐1 drug for one or multiple indications, but 54% of users report afford...

item.title: Miss ‘Stranger Things’ Already? LEGO’s Creel House Is Here To Help
item.description: The Creel House is, quite fittingly, a monster set, and was officially launched at the same time as the Stranger Things finale.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Mind Flayer-Vecna Fight Is Being Misunderstood
item.description: The Stranger Things series finale featured a huge showdown between Vecna joining the Mind Flayer fighting the rest of the cast. But people aren't gett...

item.title: Northern Lights Alert Friday: 20 States May See Aurora ‘Direct Hit’
item.description: A NOAA forecast suggest that Northern Lights may be visible in northern U.S. states this weekend during a G2 geomagnetic storm.

item.title: San Francisco Blackout Reveals AI’s Dependence On Power Infrastructure
item.description: Power outage San Francisco affected humans and AI systems alike. As Waymo had to navigate 7,000 dark traffic signals, it highlighted the AI's reliance...

item.title: 1981 time machine

item.title: Which kind of ‘enough’?
